com. mab. ui. BasicButton

MovieClip
com.mab.ui.BasicButton
com.mab.ui.ToggleButton

Description

Simple button class allowing you to easily create a button from a MC within the Flash IDE and assign a target & action via AS.

Version

1.0

Author

Michael Bianco, http://mabblog.com/

Date

11/4/05

Summary
com. mab. ui. BasicButton
Simple button class allowing you to easily create a button from a MC within the Flash IDE and assign a target & action via AS.
Variables
target
The scope to apply the action on
action
The function to call whenh the button is pressed
_offAlpha
Alpha value while the button is inactive
_onAlpha
Alpha value while the mouse is over the button
_pressAlpha
Alpha value when the button is being pressed
rollAction
_offAlpha
_onAlpha
_pressAlpha

onPress

function onPress()

onRelease

function onRelease()

onRelease() event.  If the target variable is specified action is exacuted in the scope of target.  If target is not specified then action is exacuting in the scope of this button.  A reference to this button is always passed to the reciever
